description: From Urdu پرگنة‎ (Hindi परगना (paragnā)), from Persian پرگنة‎.

entries.meaning: (India) An administrative unit of India, consisting of a number of villages. [from 17th c.] Since Indian independence, replaced by the block or tahsil.
examples: ‘I shall advise His Highness to sanction at least a high school in the capital, and if possible another in each pargana.’
